description: Fresh and grilled fruit, banana bread and marshmallows dipped in peanut butter fondue. This spectacular platter will be a big hit at brunch or a barbecue.
name: Peanut Butter Fondue Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red apple, thickly sliced into rounds
2 pears, halved, cored, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place peanut butter, 1/2 cup cream and 2 tbs syrup in a heatproof, microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 1 minute 30 seconds, stirring every 30 seconds with a metal spoon, or until melted and smooth. Transfer to a bowl.

Place remaining cream and syrup in a separate heatproof, microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 1 minute or until heated through. Add chocolate and stand for 1 minute. Stir with a metal spoon until melted and smooth.

Thread banana bread, banana and strawberries onto 8 metal skewers. Spray lightly with oil. Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Cook skewers for 5 minutes, turning, or until golden. Remove skewers from heat. Carefully add marshmallows to tops of skewers. Cook for 1 minute or until warmed through.
sprinkle some of the pistachios over peanut butter fondue. Arrange fondue, chocolate mixture, skewers and fruit on a large platter. Scatter over mint and serve with remaining pistachios.
